name: Lively Chair Simulator
description:
Lively Chair Simulator is a game with freaky controls. In the game, you are moving a chair by controlling each of the legs of the chair individually. Sounds difficult, but walking is not the limit of a chair. They can run and maybe jump. Have a Try, it is free for now. See if you are suitable for being a chair.

In single mode, there are some levels to let you get good control of the chair. Some chairs may not be suitable for passing all levels. After finishing the levels, you should know how to walk, run, upslope, upstairs, push boxes, and jump.

In multiplayer mode, there are three games
– 15m Race
– Pushing Game
– StoneBall

StoneBall is a popular game among chairs. It is a 5v5 team battle and the goal is to get 10000 points in the first place. There are five different stoneballs, a public stoneball, two team pointing stoneballs, and two
team target stoneballs.
– Earning points if public stoneball or your team target stoneball in range of your team pointing stoneball.
– Losing points if no team members are in range of your team pointing stoneball or any team stoneballs from the other team in range of your team pointing stoneball.


Features:
– 6 different chairs
– 10 levels
– Multiplayer
– Achievements
– Simple 3D Graphics
